msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left, top and the right sides, almost regularly cut at the top; broken at the bottom. Kollesis at the end of the column. There are few lacunae in the left margin of the column. A tiny damage can bbe seen in the right hand side of the column at the result of vertical fold. There are few wrinkles throughout the papyrus need to be unfolded. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. The scribe wrote some words on the verso, presumably as a draft. (MA)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
